arts.ttl: Pavlovic looking forward to ‘great’ Juve clash as Milan have ‘more confidence’
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Strahinja Pavlovic briefly spoke to the media ahead of AC Milan’s game against Juventus, which is an opportunity for the Rossoneri to make it five consecutive wins. It has indeed been a good start to the season for Milan and Pavlovic has played a pretty big part. arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri has named the AC Milan side that will take on Juventus, and continuity is the key once again. Milan approach the game in good form and in good health. arts.ttl: Pulisic drives Milan’s attack yet Juventus still a challenging barrier
arts.sum: Milan are preparing to face Juventus at the Allianz Stadium in Turin for Matchday 6 of the 2025/26 Serie A season. The Rossoneri, coached by Allegri, will take on Tudor’s side in a match expected to deliver plenty of drama. Both teams are in strong form, with Milan aiming to extend their winning streak. arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher The Curva Sud will not be present to cheer on AC Milan at the Allianz Stadium on Sunday night as they are protesting about ticket prices. As MilanNews report, for yet another year, the Curva Sud Milano will not be traveling to Turin.
